message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it's worth a lot, but I'm willing to start the negotiations at $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer $10,500 for the product. Can you consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you see the value in this product. However, I'm looking for something closer to $11,000. Would you be willing to go up a bit?
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,750 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference and settle at $10,875? This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,750 again. Can you consider that?
